options.content:
`value`: MP_Assets_Identification: select Value FROM "Checkpoints" WHERE Id = 2\
`lag`:   MP_Assets_Scans: select count(*) from asset_scans where orderedid>{value}

`value1`:  maxpatrol_assets_processing: select Value from checkpoints WHERE Id = 'IdentificationService'\
`value2`:  MP_Assets_Identification: select max(checkpoint) from commits where streamtype in ('ScopeKeySet', 'IdentityRemoveProcessManager','IdentityExpirationProcessManager')\
`lag`: as diff

`value`:  maxpatrol_assets_processing: select Value from checkpoints WHERE Id = 'GroupsService'\
`lag`:  maxpatrol_assets_processing: select count(*) from commits where streamtype in('Asset', 'AssetInputProcessManager', 'AssetsGroupsRelocationProcessManager', 'AssetsRemoveProcessManager', 'Group', 'Scope') and checkpoint>{value}

panels.title: [R24] LAG HISTORY: Assets processing buffer processing

options.content:
`value`:  MP_Assets_Scans: select max(orderedid) from asset_scans\
`lag`:  MP_Assets_Scans: select count(*) from asset_raw_scans where orderedid>{value}

`value`:  maxpatrol_assets_temporal_rm: select Value from checkpoints WHERE Id = 'AssetsEventProcessingService'\
`lag`:  maxpatrol_assets_processing: select count(*) from commits where streamtype in('Asset, 'AssetInputProcessManager', 'VulnerableAsset', 'AssetsRemoveProcessManager', 'Group', 'Scope', 'GroupAsset', 'AssetsPassportUpdateProcessManager', 'AssetsGroupsRelocationProcessManager', 'GroupOperationProcessManager, 'Tag', 'VulnerabilityOperationProcessManager', 'TagRemoveProcessManager') and checkpoint>{value}
